short_description: prens carpet is a carpets, rugs & other floor covers supplier based in şehitkamil, turkey.
long_description: unique creation is our timeless passion. established in 1975, prens carpet co. begun it's journey of business under the name of 'ulutash carpet' and operated until the early 2000's when prens carpet branding was born with second generation management and developing technology as well as with a brand new vision of business for future. prens carpet, the spirit of the time, young, entrepreneur, innovative, open to development, based on customer satisfaction with a team and always aim totally for customer satistaction all round is and highest standards as possible at all times. we, as a prens carpet family, operate our business with an amateur soul and a prefessional approach. we would like to invite you to be a part of our success story.
generated_description: prens carpet, legally known as prens carpet co., is subject to regular unannounced visits from relevant government departments. the company emphasizes customer satisfaction and operates with a professional approach while maintaining a youthful, entrepreneurial spirit.
generated_business_tags: information security measures | test collection | child labor-free operations | iso certification | carpet manufacturing | export services | trading account creation
